alert.note: Alert for East Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 30 at 11:40PM CST until December 01 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST FRIDAY... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...East Cameron Parish. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 3 AM CST Friday. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
